title: No, CBSE is Not Reconducting Class 12 Physics, Economics Exams
subtitle: CBSE Class 12 Re-Exam Fake News: photograph of a notice by the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE), announcing the reconduct of the Class 12 Board Physics and Economics examinations, has been doing the rounds on WhatsApp.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A photograph of a notice by the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE), announcing the reconduct of the Class 12 Board Physics and Economics examinations, has been doing the rounds on WhatsApp.

A reader sent across the following image to WebQoof to check the veracity of the notice:
